title: What's new in v2.49.0
content:
Features:
- Tile move tool
- Quick shape (applicable for brush, eraser, and straight line)
- HSL mode for color adjustment

Enhancements:
- Shortcuts (gesture pad and joystick) will switch to the respective tile or regular tools based on the current context
- Improved brush stabilization
- Persisted handy joystick's actions when turned off and on again
- Some other minor enhancements

Fixes:
- Fixed blurry preview in layer-only panel
